Articles.Content: When there\'s a new update, i imagine that the kerbal\'s scientists invent new parts, and ideas, and also discover new planets. (if those are added) Who else imagines this every update? ;D

I refuse to read the updates because they\'re too painful. When I hear about the things they\'re going to add to the game, I want them NOWNOWNOWNOW! Rather than inspire the mods to place restraining orders on me, I just try not to even think about it.
So for the EVA update, does that mean the Kerbals have just worked out \'door\' technology?
...how did they get into the capsule, before? Confuzling.

...how did they get into the capsule, before? Confuzling.

They just build the capsule around the pilots. They NEVER get out, thus why if your crew survives, they\'ll always be on the next flight. Different command modules are just shells made around the pod.

...how did they get into the capsule, before? Confuzling.

If I could give a shameless plug, the doors are just painted on.

Capt\'n Skunky

Kerbal Comics

If I could give a shameless plug, the doors are just painted on.

Kerbal Comics

I must say, that was my favorite ever comic from IHRS

That comic was hysterical

I refuse to read the updates because they\'re too painful. When I hear about the things they\'re going to add to the game, I want them NOWNOWNOWNOW! Rather than inspire the mods to place restraining orders on me, I just try not to even think about it.

Your a very smart man i tried doing that but failed ill retry next update

I, too, imagine each new part is fresh off the assembly line and the engineer\'s workshops. When you consider Minmus only being a recent discovery, it is easy to consider as it appears as a star in Kerbin\'s night sky. Of course, now the scientists are wondering what other 'stars' up there might actually be neighboring worlds. It is only a matter of time before they reveal their discoveries.

I have been quite happy with the updates we get so far, as each one has given me at least one big surprise so far. There wasn\'t any hint of Minmus coming before it was announced for the current update. I was wondering what the hell people were talking about in the forum about this minmus thing until I saw there was a new update released and Minmus was actually a second moon of Kerbin. Excitement, glee, and joy!

And now we have EVA/IVA\'s forecasted for the next update. I didn\'t expect those until about the same time as docking, if not after that.

For all I know, Harv may pull a fast one and give us an actual comet along with the rocky planets. If it\'s just a ghost placeholder as Kerbol is now, that will be fine with me. Will still be amazing to behold.
